article_title: EEOC's Strange War Against ObamaCare And Employer Wellness Plans

article_metadata.description: The EEOC seems determined to challenge provisions in the Affordable Care Act and the Americans With Disabilities Act allowing employers to offer voluntary incentives in wellness programs, a former EEOC general counsel says.
article_metadata.author: Daniel Fisher

og.description: The EEOC seems determined to challenge provisions in the Affordable Care Act and the Americans With Disabilities Act allowing employers to offer voluntary incentives in wellness programs, a former EEOC general counsel says.
